(as of Nov 30,2022 06:10:08 UTC – Details)


Samsung Galaxy A22 5G mobile was launched on 2nd June 2021. The phone comes with a 6.60-inch touchscreen display. Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is powered by an octa-core processor. It comes with 4GB of RAM. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs Android 11 and is powered by a 5000mAh battery. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G supports proprietary fast charging. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G on the rear packs a triple camera setup featuring a 48-megapixel primary camera with an f/1.8 aperture; a 5-megapixel camera with an f/2.2 aperture; a 2-megapixel camera, and a 2-megapixel camera with an f/2.4 aperture. The rear camera setup has autofocus. It has a single front camera setup for selfies, featuring an 8-megapixel sensor with an f/2.0 aperture. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs One UI Core 3.1 is based on Android 11 and packs 64GB of inbuilt storage (up to 1000GB). The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is a dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G measures 167.20 x 76.40 x 9.00mm (height x width x thickness) and weighs 203.00 grams. It was launched in Grey, Mint, and Violet color. Connectivity options on the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G include Wi-Fi, GPS, USB Type-C, 3G, and 4G (with support for Band 40 used by some LTE networks in India). Sensors on the phone include accelerometer, ambient light sensor, proximity sensor, and fingerprint sensor.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Expandable MicroSD, MediaTek MT6833 Dimensity 700 5G (7 nm), Octa-core, Mali-G57 MC2
Dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. Rear Camera: 48MP, F1.8 + 5MP, F2.2 + 2MP, F2.4 (depth), Front Camera: 8MP, F2.0
2G Bands: 850, 900, 1800, 1900MHz, 3G Bands: 850, 900, 1700, 1900, 4G LTE Bands: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 12, 17, 20, 26, 28, 38, 40, 41 , 66
5G Bands: N1(2100), N3(1800), N5(850), N7(2600), N8(900), N20(800), N28(700), N66(AWS-3) N38(2600), N40(2300), N41(2500), N78(3500). May not get 5G as it is not available in all regions. Please check with your carrier for compatible 5G Bands.
International Model compatible with Most GSM Carriers in US and Global like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Sprint.

4

From the brand

V+bestlife

We are constantly discovering and meeting the needs of this changing world, we believe in V (victory), we can pursue the best life!

We think instant messaging will be more and more important in our lives and it is! Similarly, we believe that there will be more and more different changes in the demand for instant messaging. In order to allow more people who do not have instant messaging to join the information life, in this field, we are committed to discovering some distinctive and more Easy circulation of cell phones and telephone!

Information spreads faster in this world; we are committed to better understanding needs and producing products that better meet them!

How did we get our start?

We found that some needs were not being met, and then we wanted to address the situation.

What makes our products unique?

Whether it is in different countries, different regions, or different concepts and consumption habits, the development of the world makes consumer demand change extremely fast and huge. We are constantly discovering this change, catching up with this change, meeting this change, and making our products more in line with consumer needs. This is our starting point, and this is why we think our products are different.

IP12 PRO Android Smartphone

IP12 PRO Unlocked Android Smartphone ,6.26in Waterdrop Full Screen Dual SIM Cell Phone ,Ultra Thin Mobile Phone

3G Android Smartphone For Sale

Vintage wired landline phone

Unlocked Android Smartphone

Unlocked Android Smartphone

HD Resolution：720*1560 high definition resolution , front and rear cameras , vivid colors , every photo is as beautiful as wallpaper. Shoot beautiful portraits , stunning landscapes and clear close up shots in any light
High Performance：Quad core CPU , powerful processor , greatly improves the network , running speed , frame rate and picture smoothness when playing large games and multitasking.Face recognition can always be accurately identified , bringing you a science fiction experience
Large Storage Space：1+8GB memory storage and up to 128GB expandable storage , support two SIM cards for data and phone calls at the same time , or use Micro SD card for data storage at the same time. The dual card dual standby function meets your needs for multiple SIMs
Android 8.1 System：Based on the in-depth development of the Android system, it is more complete and smooth. Android 8.1 is compatible with most applications on the market. In addition to the smartphone of this product, you will also get a protective cover*1, protective film*1, earphone*1, data cable*1, manual*1


Vbestlife Goals

At Vbestlife, our goal is to provide innovative, high-quality products that everyone can afford. Quality is the key! If for any reason, you don’t like Vbestlife’s smartphones, please tell us and we will help you solve it.

  • Creativity
  • High quality
  • High performance
  • Quality after-sales service

Vbestlife Android Smartphone

Excellent Smartphone

The mobile phone is equipped with a 6.26-inch high-definition full-fit water drop screen, 720*1560 high-definition resolution, a powerful quad-core CPU, 1+8GB memory storage, dual-card dual-standby, deep development based on the Android system, comfortable use experience, smooth operation.

  • 6.26-inch Full Screen
  • HD Resolution
  • Large Storage Space
  • Android 8.1 System

Read more

High Definition Camera

The smart phone is equipped with a high-definition camera, with bright colors, and each photo is as beautiful as a wallpaper. It is deeply developed and more complete and smooth. Front camera: 2MP, f/2.0 aperture, fixed focal length, rear camera: 2MP (color, f/1.8 aperture) autofocus.

Dual Card Dual Standby

This smart phone supports the simultaneous use of two SIM cards for data and phone calls, or the simultaneous use of memory cards for data storage. Scalable storage up to 128GB (128G memory card not included).

Battery Capacity

The 6.26-inch high-definition full-fit water drop screen is equipped with a 1950mah lithium-ion battery. The powerful processor greatly improves the running speed, frame rate and smoothness of the picture when playing large-scale games and multitasking.

Read more

Face Recognition

Accurate identification, bring you a science fiction experience！

Read more

Vbestlife IP12 PRO+

6.26 inch Large Screen Smartphone

The high-definition large-screen smart phone allows you to experience a broader field of view and display more content, allowing you to enjoy and enjoy it more when playing games or watching videos.

The weight of the smartphone is only 365g. When you hold it in your hand, the phone is still small and light, which is convenient for you to use. This is a high-performance smartphone with both practicality and professionalism.

Package List:

  • 1 x Phone
  • 1 x Protect Cover
  • 1 x Film
  • 1 x Earphone
  • 1 x Data Cable
  • 1 x Manual

Read more

Special Christmas Gift

On the occasion of Christmas, this smartphone is also the best gift for your family and friends!

Read more

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);

var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;

onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,

);

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:52 UTC – Details)


This Tracfone Alcatel A406 prepaid cell phone serves as a useful alternative to people who don’t want to commit to a month-to-month cell service plan. With this prepaid phone, You can pay as you go. This allows you to track the amount of money you’re spending easily. The prepaid Flip phone is easy to use and helps you keep track of your day-to-day. The phone book holds up to 1, 000 entries, and the hands-free speaker allows you to connect easily while driving. Listen to your favorite tunes on the MP3 player, and take photos and videos to share with friends and family.
Google Is Here To Assist You. As part of the KaiOS experience, the MY FLIP 2 comes preloaded with Google Assistant, which helps you get things done and find answers on the go, using just your voice.
Accessibility For All. The MY FLIP 2 comes with a host of accessibility features Real-Time-Text (RTT) and hearing aid compatibility that enables any user to easily stay connected. Plus, a dedicated external SOS button allows the user to call for help in case of an emergency.
BIG BUTTONS and large, legible numbers and make dialing effortless.
POWERFUL SPEAKER ensures every conversation will be loud and clear.

  1. Take control of your wireless life

    Tracfone offers Unlimited Talk and Text plans with Unlimited Carryover Data*

  2. Now you’re in control

    Experience wireless freedom. You don’t want to be locked into a contract, that’s why Tracfone doesn’t have them. Plus, there are no activation or cancellation fees, ever.



Choose Your Refill


Unlimited Talk & Text Plus 3GB


Unlimited Talk & Text Plus 4GB


Unlimited Talk & Text Plus 8GB

Plan Type

No-contract individual plan

Plan Type

No-contract individual plan

Plan Type

No-contract individual plan

Unlimited

Talk, Text

Service Days

30 Days of Service

Service Days

30 Days of Service

Data

3GB Carryover Data at High Speed

Data

4GB Carryover Data at High Speed

Data

8GB Carryover Data at High Speed

How will my plan card be delivered?

A physical Tracfone plan card will be shipped directly to you.

Do I need a PIN to go with this plan?

The PIN to activate your new plan is on the back of the plan card. You do not need a separate PIN.

Do I need a SIM card with this plan?

You’ll need a Tracfone compatible phone (which comes with a built-in SIM card) or Keep Your Own Phone SIM Kit to activate service. If you already have an active Tracfone phone, add your plan to your account by following the instructions on the card.

How do I activate service with Tracfone?

You can activate service on the Tracfone website. You’ll need the IMEI/MEID/Serial # from a Tracfone phone or Tracfone SIM Card and a service plan PIN ready. Follow the step-by-step instructions provided in your package.

Where can I buy a phone that is compatible with this wireless service plan?

All Tracfone phones available on Amazon are compatible with this plan or you can activate service on a phone you already have with a Tracfone Keep Your Own Phone SIM Kit.

Disclaimers

*Unlimited Carryover: For Unlimited Talk & Text Smartphone plans, any unused data after your service end date will carryover to the next cycle if active service is maintained and in use with any Unlimited Talk & Text Smartphone plan. For other service plans, any unused minutes, texts and data will not expire as long as any Tracfone service plan is active and in use within any six-month period.

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:21:30 UTC – Details)


Life is to be lived and live it you do. That’s why you need Nokia C20 in your life. With its impeccable Scandinavian design and sturdy build-quality, all-day battery life, fast processor and Android 11 (Go edition) – it can handle almost anything life throws at you. Plus its big HD+ screen and speedy 4G connectivity, makes unwinding to a movie on-the-go a real treat. Its quality camera with a flash on both sides, makes sharing your life with loved ones even more beautiful. With Nokia C20, life just gets better. Compatibility: This device is designed to work with GSM carriers. This product will not support Verizon or Verizon subsidiaries. Please confirm compatibility with your chosen carrier before purchasing. For support with SIM card or network related issues, please contact your carrier for assistance in connecting your device to the chosen compatible network. Supported Network bands: 2G: 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 3G: 850 / 900 / 1700(AWS) / 1900 / 2100 4G/LTE: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 12, 17, 28, 66 Charging: This product is designed to be charged using the charging adapter and charging cable that are provided in the product box. Charging this device with any other charging adapter or cable may cause device malfunction. Please observe basic safety steps when charging this device and do not charge this product with malfunctioning or damaged equipment. Current Software Version: Android 10 Bluetooth Version/Range: 4.2 – 30’ Range FAQ How can I install available updates? In many cases updating your product to the latest software version will alleviate any issues experienced. To update your device please navigate to Settings > System > System update > Check for update to check if updates are available. Follow the on screen prompts to install the latest software version if available.= How can I close an app that has stopped working? Open Settings on your phone and select Apps. Then find the app you’re having issues with and select Force Stop. I want to conserve battery life. How can I activate the Power Saver mode? On your phone, open Settings, then choose and activate Battery Power Saving. Please also be aware that battery life depends on a variety of factors such as device usage frequency, application requirements, your current operating system, and cellular signal strength. How can I back up my files? Navigate to Settings > System > Backup, and switch backup on. How can I reset my smartphone’s network settings? Navigate to Settings > Network & Internet > more_vert > Reset. Performing this reset may help if you’re having connection issues. How do I connect my phone to my carrier network? If your Nokia phone and network are compatible, place your SIM card in the SIM card tray using the included SIM card removal tool to open the SIM tray. Once your SIM card has been inserted into the device, power on your phone and proceed through the product setup steps. If you are not able to connect to your network after finalizing the product setup, please contact your carrier support for additional assistance as every carrier has different steps to assist you in ensuring your product connects to their compatible network. How can I ensure other people hear me on my microphone? If you are experiencing microphone issues with your device and your product has a Google Assistant button, please ensure that the Google Assistant button is not stuck or dirty as this will cause the microphone to not function as intended. If the Google Assistant button is not obstructed, please ensure that there is no dirt or debris in the headphone port of your product. If the headphone port is also clear, please disable the microphone permission of the Google Assistant, by going to Settings > Apps & Notifications > Google App > Permission > Microphone > Deny. How can I turn up the volume to my speaker? First, please ensure that there is no dirt or debris in the headphone port of your product. If your headphone port is clear, please make sure that “Do Not Disturb” is not enabled. To disable this setting, navigate to Settings > Do not disturb. Make sure this is toggled off. If Do Not Disturb is off, navigate to Settings > Sounds and vibration > Volume > move the Media slider to the right to increase volume and test your speaker. If you are still not able to hear any audio, check the settings of the application that you are using from the Settings menu as many applications will have their own volume settings. Why is my phone feeling warm, closing apps or occasionally slowing down? During extended operation, the device may feel warm. In most cases, this is normal. To avoid getting too warm, the device may automatically slow down, dim display during a video call, close apps, switch off charging, and if necessary, switch itself off. If the device is not working properly, take it to the nearest authorized service facility. How do I reboot my smartphone when it’s not responding? If your phone is unresponsive, you can perform a “soft reset” by pressing the volume up key and the power button simultaneously for about 15 seconds (or until phone vibrates). Your phone should then restart momentarily. This is a safe and quick way to reboot your device without losing or erasing any data. My phone won’t charge. What should I do? First ensure the issue isn’t with the power source or socket you’re using – you can quickly check this by plugging your phone into a different outlet, then checking if it charges. If the socket is not the issue, try taking a closer look at the power cable or charging port on your phone, ensuring everything appears as it should. Then, try turning your phone off completely and plugging it into the socket – bear in mind if the battery is completely drained, it might take up to 2 or 3 minutes to start charging. How can I contact support? Our customer support page offers a number of ways that you can contact support. Please visit the Nokia website for further assistance. How do I fix touch sensitivity issues on my phone? Before performing any additional troubleshooting steps, please ensure that your product does not show any physical damage, has not been exposed to water, the screen is clean, and your fingers and hands are not wet or dirty. Please also remove any 3rd party screen protectors that you may have on the device as non Nokia branded screen protectors may decrease the touch sensitivity of the device. If none of these solutions resolve the issue that you are facing, please perform a hard reset back to factory settings. Please note: a hard reset will completely erase all the data, settings and content on your smartphone, returning it to the original factory settings. We strongly advise that you back up your device before a hard reset. Visit here to learn more about how to back up your smartphone remotely. To reset your smartphone and erase all its content, first make sure your phone is connected to a power source. We also recommend that your battery is at least 50% charged when you perform a hard reset. Press the volume up key and the power button simultaneously for about 30 seconds or until the root menu appears. Then choose the action you want to take from the root menu, in this case “Wipe data/factory reset”. Alternatively, you can also perform a hard reset by tapping Settings > Backup & Reset > Factory data reset > Reset phone > Erase everything.
Capture the best of family moments
Be immersed in what you watch, whenever you want. Do more, watch more, listen to more – even as you move more
Get to what’s on your phone faster – but keep it all safer
Product is compatible with GSM carriers. Carrier network coverage is dependent upon the carrier’s service area. Product is not compatible with Verizon. Please confirm compatibility and product support with your carrier before you order.


Read more


Read more




The value of quality

As you would expect from Nordic design, the Nokia C20 doesn’t just look sleek, it’s built to last from quality materials. This isn’t just a smartphone, it’s a lifeline to your family and friends.

Keep up with the action

Nokia C20 LED flash on both the front and rear camera, means all your videos will come out clear and bright. Plus, with 4G, sharing those unforgettable family moments with the people that matter most is easy and lag-free.

Big in size. Big on lasting all day.

With a wide HD+ screen, Nokia C20 is big enough for the whole family to get lost in videos and music. And with an all-day battery, you can dive in at any time.

Read more


Get to things that matter, faster.

Family life moves at its own pace. With fast 4G you get to keep up with it, all while on the go. With its Octa-core processor and the latest operating system, you can rely on Nokia C20 to get things done swiftly.

Read more


Faster, smoother, safer.

An impressive phone needs an impressive and trustworthy operating system. Android 11 (Go edition) is exactly that, making it easier and faster to use while the added security features keep everything personal safe.

Read more

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

More display means more room to play: Expand your view to the 6.5-inch Infinity-V Display of Galaxy A12 Nacho and see what you’ve been missing. Thanks to HD+ technology, your everyday content looks sharp, crisp and clear. Upgrade your mobile photography with Quad Camera: Snap memorable moments in clear detail with the 48MP Main Camera. Expand the viewing angle with Ultra Wide Camera. Customize focus with Depth Camera, or get closer to the details with Macro Camera. Power that keeps you going: Stay ahead of the day with a battery that won’t slow you down. The 5,000mAh (typical) battery lets you keep doing what you do, for hours on end. And with up to 15W of Adaptive Fast Charging, Galaxy A12 Nacho quickly gets back to full power. Give yourself more room to play: Galaxy A12 Nacho combines Octa-core processing power with up to 4GB of RAM for fast and efficient performance for the task at hand. Enjoy 128GB of internal storage.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Exynos 850 (8nm), Octa-core (4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55), Mali-G52, Android 11, One UI 3.1
Rear Camera: 48MP, F2.0 + 5MP, F2.2 + 2MP, F2.4 + 2MP, F2.4, Front Camera: 8MP, F2.2, Bluetooth 5.0
2G Bands: 850, 900, 1800, 1900MHz, 3G Bands: 850, 900, 1700, 1900, 4G LTE Bands: 1, 3, 5, 7, 8, 20, 28, 38, 40, 41 – Dual SIM
International Model – No Warranty in US. Compatible with Most GSM Carriers like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Cricket, Boost

Information
Turn your great times into magical memories with a 50MP AI triple camera. Enjoy collecting memories with large storage of up to 64GB. Two-day battery life keeps you doing what you love, while a minimalistic design makes you live in style. The face key & fingerprint sensor provide access effortlessly.

Technical Parameters:
2G Quadbands : GSM 850/900/1800/1900
3G Bands : B1/2/4/5/8
4G LTE bands: B2/3/4/5/7/8/12/13/17/26/28/66
Display: 6.52-inch Mini-notch HD+ 20:9 display (720 x 1600 pixels)
Screen-to-body ratio: 90%
AI Quad Camera: 50MP Main Camera+2MP Macro Camera+2MP Depth Camera
Front camera resolution: 8MP
Chipset: Helio G25
CPU: 4 x Cortex-A53 @ 2.0GHz+4 x Cortex-A53 @ 1.5GHz
GPU: IMG GE8320 650MHz
Memory: 4GB RAM + 64GB ROM (Supports micro SD card up to 512GB, SD card not included)
Dimensions:.6.50 x 2.97 x 0.35 inch
Battery: 5000mAh
Audio：One speaker + dual-mic noise cancellation

What’s in the box
1 x TCL 30 SE Mobile phone
1 x TCL 30 SE Mobile Phone Case
1 x Screen Protector
1 x Type-C Cable
1 x Charger (5V 2A)
1 x Sim Card Pin 
1 x Quick Guide
Notes: Headphones, SIM Card and SD Card are not included.
6.52″ HD+ display: Powered by NXTVISION, AI optimization allows the screen to deliver more colorfulness and crisp clarity to immerse you in subtle details. Eye-comfort modes have better protection against blue light. You will feel less eye strain while using TCL mobile phone 30 SE in dimly lit places and enjoy reading time comfortably under sunlight. 
Wireless carrier: Compatible with the T-Mobile and AT&T LTE networks. This device is currently not certified for use on Verizon. Not compatible with any CDMA networks. (such as Verizon, Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
50MP AI triple camera & Gesture shooting: With TCL 30 SE android phone, you can capture fast-moving subjects or take clear photos in dimly lit environments. Gesture shooting entirely frees your hands and makes taking easier.
Two-day battery life: 5000 mAh massive battery lets you worry less about battery levels during weekends. Two-day battery life keeps you doing what you love, and intelligent charging mode prolongs the battery’s lifespan.
TCL 30 SE mobile phone does not support 5G, NFC, and 5Ghz Wi-Fi.This Model is the US version with a one-year US warranty, single SIM.
About screen sensitivity: Our phones are set to a neutral screen sensitivity defaultly. If you find the screen unsensitive, please adjust the sensitivity level through settings ( Settings -> System – > Languages & input ->Advanced ->Pointer speed).Drag the slider right to increase sensitivity. Drag the slider left to decrease sensitivity.


Previous page

  1. PREMIUM DISPLAY, INTUITIVE FEATURES

    Enjoy the expansive 6.52” display, powered by NXTVISION. Watch as your videos and photos come to life with vibrant true-to-life color enhancements and real-time HDR upscaling.

  2. BINGE WITHOUT WORRY

    Adaptive Eye care modes reduce harmful blue lights, turn monochromatic for a booklike feel, and promotes readability in direct sunlight.

Next page

Previous page

  1. INTELLIGENTLY BEAUTIFUL

    Capturing stunning photos and HD video has never been so easy with AI-powered 50MP triple rear camera system with 2MP Depth and Macro lens.

  2. COMPLETE ANY CHALLENGE

    Use the built-in features to make taking the perfect photo even easier, with Gesture Shot a simple movement can activate the countdown timer and Steady Snap to capture motion with less blur.

  3. BEAUTIFULLY YOU

    Show your best side in video chats using the 8MP front-facing camera, while HDR elevates all your stunning selfies.

Next page

Previous page

  1. MAXIMUM RELIABILITY

    Take on your day or new adventures with a powerful 5000mAh battery delivers a days worth of mixed-use on a single charge letting you focus on the task at hand and not searching for the next outlet.

  2. MORE FOR YOU TO ENJOY

    Feel the sublime user experience powered by a 2.0GHz octa-core processor and multitask to your hearts delight with 4GB of RAM for always smooth performance.

  3. ENOUGH SPACE FOR IT ALL

    Store all of your favorite content with 64GB of internal storage, expandable to 512GB via microSD card (sold separately).

Next page

ARTFULLY CRAFTED, DIGITALLY SECURE

Simple and sleek with a finish that glistens in the light. Biometric security safely stores your data and content so only you can access it.

RAM 4 GB
Wireless communication technologies Bluetooth, Cellular, Wi-Fi, NFC
Connectivity technologies Wi-Fi
GPS True
Special Features Smartphone
Other display features Wireless
Device interface – primary Touchscreen
Other camera features Rear, Front
Audio Jack 3.5 mm
Form Factor Bar
Colour Atlantic Blue
Battery Power Rating 5000 Milliampere Hour (mAh)
Included Components 1 x Screen Protector, 1 x Quick Guide, 1 x Charger (5V 2A), 1 x TCL 30 SE Mobile Phone Case, 1 x Type-C Cable
Manufacturer TCL
Country of Origin China
Date First Available April 13, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $159.99 - $149.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:21:24 UTC – Details)


Network
NO 5G AND NFC
Compatible with the T-Mobile and AT&T LTE networks. networks. TCL 30 SE android phone is currently not certified for use on Verizon. Not compatible with any CDMA networks. (such as Verizon, Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)

Note
* TCL 30 SE is single SIM mobile phone, does not support 5G, NFC, and 5Ghz Wi-Fi.
* Wifi calling supported on these carriers: T-mobile, Metro, Straight talk/tracfone t-mobile sim card, simple, walmart family mobile, ultra mobile, mint mobile.

Information
Turn your great times into magical memories with a 50MP AI triple camera. Enjoy collecting memories with large storage of up to 128GB. Two-day battery life keeps you doing what you love, while a minimalistic design makes you live in style. The face key & fingerprint sensor provide access effortlessly.

Technical Parameters:
2G Quadbands : GSM 850/900/1800/1900
3G Bands : B1/2/4/5/8
4G LTE bands: B2/3/4/5/7/8/12/13/17/26/28/66
Display: 6.52-inch Mini-notch HD+ 20:9 display (720 x 1600 pixels)
Screen-to-body ratio: 90%
AI Quad Camera: 50MP Main Camera+2MP Macro Camera+2MP Depth Camera
Front camera resolution: 8MP
Chipset: Helio G25
CPU: 4 x Cortex-A53 @ 2.0GHz+4 x Cortex-A53 @ 1.5GHz
GPU: IMG GE8320 650MHz
Memory: 4GB RAM + 128GB ROM (Supports micro SD card up to 512GB, SD card not included)
Dimensions:.6.50 x 2.97 x 0.35 inch
Battery: 5000mAh
Audio：One speaker + dual-mic noise cancellation

What’s in the box
1 x TCL 30 SE Mobile phone
1 x TCL 30 SE Mobile Phone Case
1 x Screen Protector
1 x Type-C Cable
1 x Charger (5V 2A)
1 x Sim Card Pin 
1 x Quick Guide
Notes: Headphones, SIM Card and SD Card are not included.
6.52″ HD+ display: Powered by NXTVISION, AI optimization allows the screen to deliver more colorfulness and crisp clarity to immerse you in subtle details. Eye-comfort modes have better protection against blue light. You will feel less eye strain while using TCL mobile phone 30 SE in dimly lit places and enjoy reading time comfortably under sunlight. 
Wireless carrier: Compatible with the T-Mobile and AT&T LTE networks. This device is currently not certified for use on Verizon. Not compatible with any CDMA networks. (such as Verizon, Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
50MP AI triple camera & Gesture shooting: With TCL 30 SE android phone, you can capture fast-moving subjects or take clear photos in dimly lit environments. Gesture shooting entirely frees your hands and makes taking easier.
Two-day battery life: 5000 mAh massive battery lets you worry less about battery levels during weekends. Two-day battery life keeps you doing what you love, and intelligent charging mode prolongs the battery’s lifespan.
TCL 30 SE mobile phone does not support 5G, NFC, and 5Ghz Wi-Fi.This Model is the US version with a one-year US warranty, single SIM.
About screen sensitivity: Our phones are set to a neutral screen sensitivity defaultly. If you find the screen unsensitive, please adjust the sensitivity level through settings ( Settings -> System – > Languages & input ->Advanced ->Pointer speed).Drag the slider right to increase sensitivity. Drag the slider left to decrease sensitivity.
